title: All-Party Parliamentary Group Beauty and Wellbeing
purpose: The group seeks to spotlight and raise the reputation of the beauty industry by investigating and exploring key issues that impact the sectors within it. By highlighting these issues, the group aims to underscore the importance of tackling misinformation, and the economic and social benefits to the UK.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 4316.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Victoria Brownlie, British Beauty Council. Tel: 07725 549 269
contact_details.secretariat: British Beauty Council acts as the group's secretariat.https://britishbeautycouncil.com/
